DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the usefulness of triphala mouthwash in comparison with the gold standard chlorhexidine in hospitalized and periodontally diseased patients.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation and Comparison of the Efficacy of Triphala Mouthwash and 0.2% Chlorhexidine
DOC.criteria: age group of 2065 years having periodontal diseases according to American Academy of Periodontology (AAP) classification 1999 patients seeking any periodontal treatment during the course of study
